name: clipchimp
description: ClipChimp - Professional media library manager with AI analysis

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:electron
scripts.install:electron: cd electron && [ -f package.json ] && npm install || echo 'No electron/package.json found, skipping...'
scripts.verify:deps: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const paths = ['backend/node_modules', 'backend/node_modules/@types/uuid', 'backend/node_modules/@types/express']; paths.forEach(p => { if (!fs.existsSync(p)) { console.error('Missing:', p); process.exit(1); }}); console.log('âœ“ All backend dependencies verified');"
scripts.clean:mac: rimraf dist-electron/mac dist-electron/mac-arm64 dist-electron/*.dmg dist-electron/*.dmg.blockmap dist-electron/latest-mac.yml mac-arm64 mac-arm64* *.dmg *.dmg.blockmap
scripts.clean:linux: rimraf dist-electron/linux-unpacked dist-electron/*.AppImage dist-electron/*.AppImage.blockmap dist-electron/*.deb dist-electron/latest-linux.yml
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:mac && npm run clean:win && npm run clean:linux && rimraf dist-electron backup
scripts.prebuild:all: npm run verify:deps || npm run install:backend
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:electron && npm run build:preload
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install --prefer-offline && tsc -p tsconfig.json && npm run build
scripts.build:fast: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend:fast && npm run build:frontend:dev && npm run build:electron && npm run build:preload
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.dev: npm run dev:build && npm run electron:dev
scripts.dev:build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:electron && npm run build:preload
scripts.electron:dev: npm run dev:build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.electron:test-packaged: npm run build:all && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron .
scripts.package:mac: npm run clean:mac && npm run download:binaries && npm run install:ffmpeg:x64 && npm run build:all && npm run package:backend:prod && npm run package:mac:electron-arm64 && npm run package:mac:electron-x64
scripts.package:mac:fast: npm run download:binaries && npm run install:ffmpeg:x64 && npm run build:fast && npm run package:backend:prod && npm run package:mac:electron-arm64 && npm run package:mac:electron-x64
scripts.package:mac-arm64: npm run clean:mac && npm run download:binaries && npm run build:all && npm run package:backend:prod && electron-builder --mac --arm64 --publish never
scripts.package:mac-arm64:fast: npm run download:binaries && npm run build:all && npm run package:backend:prod && electron-builder --mac --arm64 --publish never
scripts.package:mac-x64: npm run clean:mac && npm run download:binaries && npm run install:ffmpeg:x64 && npm run build:all && npm run package:backend:prod && electron-builder --mac --x64 --publish never
scripts.package:mac-x64:fast: npm run download:binaries && npm run install:ffmpeg:x64 && npm run build:all && npm run package:backend:prod && electron-builder --mac --x64 --publish never
scripts.package:win-x64: npm run clean:win && npm run download:binaries && npm run build:all && npm run package:backend:prod && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish never
scripts.package:win-x64:fast: npm run download:binaries && npm run build:all && npm run package:backend:prod && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish never
scripts.package:win-arm64: npm run clean:win && npm run download:binaries && npm run build:all && npm run package:backend:prod && electron-builder --win --arm64 --publish never
scripts.package:win-arm64:fast: npm run download:binaries && npm run build:all && npm run package:backend:prod && electron-builder --win --arm64 --publish never
scripts.package:linux: npm run clean:linux && npm run download:binaries && npm run build:all && npm run package:backend:prod && electron-builder --linux --publish never
scripts.package:linux:fast: npm run download:binaries && npm run build:all && npm run package:backend:prod && electron-builder --linux --publish never
